title: Daumier
creator_credit: Nico Crama and Mary Van Den Heyer
brief_description: Daumier was a ninteenth century eyewitness of England and Europe: the observer of great and small men. This film shows some of his lighographic cartoons and caricatures which relate to the period 1830-1873.
creator_credit_for_label: Nico Crama and Mary Van Den Heyer
